entry.title: Csharp Developer Learning Javascript
entry.content:
Ok I admit it, I am one of those devs who was “prod to say that I’m not good at JavaScript”. It was a thing like CSS, which as developers you could get away with not knowing much. But things have changed ( for the good ) and as of 2015 JavaScript is the most popular language on the planet. So it is inevitable that you’d want to learn it sooner or later.

C# to JavaScript blog series are my notes in trying to understand JavaScript from the foundations of C#.
